title: What's the status of the budget deficit?
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Thursday afternoon the government will release its budget deficit projection. Gus Faucher, senior economist at PNC Financial Services, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.

itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 11, 2013
contentencoded:
Thursday afternoon the government will release its budget deficit projection. Gus Faucher, senior economist at PNC Financial Services, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
